snippet: In a contest overseen by Bloomberg Philanthropies, Mayor Angel Taveras won his city $5 million to help parents improve the vocabulary of their children.
abstract: Providence, RI, Mayor Angel Taveras wins $5 million for his city in contest among mayors, overseen by Bloomberg Philanthropies, involving ideas for improving their cities.
lead_paragraph: In a contest overseen by Bloomberg Philanthropies, Mayor Angel Taveras won his city $5 million to help parents improve the vocabulary of their children.

headline.seo: Providence, R.I., Wins Mayors Challenge With Literacy Plan
headline.main: Providence Is Top City in Contest of Ideas
headline.print_headline: Providence Is Top City In Contest Of Ideas
